divs: Sighting DetailsPROBES HOVERING OVER THE SKIES IN WASHINGTON D.C On 17 July 2012, I am at the local park capturing video of UFOs hovering in the sky. I could not identify the hovering object as a model aircraft and its movements did not dictate that it was a model airplane. The object will move very rapidly in an indiscernible pattern within the night sky and is engulfed within a light that obscures the actual vessel from ground based observation but this particular probe produces a field that can generate images of objects, people, and entities. The images can be viewed when the video is paused. Below are some examples of the images the craft can generate when the video is paused. After recording the object, for the length of the video I panned down and panned the area to show the viewer(s) that I was at the local park then departed the location. Submitting file to MUFON for review and analysis.
Summary: Alien Probe Hovering Above The Skies In Washington DC Metro Area
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Temple Hills
There were no other sightings in Temple Hills on or around July 17th 2012
